title: Arclight Evelynn skin concept
body:
Nothing special art-wise but I love eve and I'd like to see a skin with some diverse vfx.

I like that the religious/cult vibe of the arclight skins contrasts so heavily with Eve's thematic design. I imagined a clash or organ/bells when she ults, like a church :)  {{champion:28}}

replies.body: I like this. I'd want something really striking and different for her next skin after the Thief skin. Beyond thematic concerns, her animation rig and model are really old and quite limiting when it comes to making skins which is always a consideration. However without a rework on the horizon I certainly hope we make another skin for her soon >:D

I'm so glad you like it!
I think Eve is definitely a champion that needs a bit of a cleanup, maybe ill join the hundreds whove tried and have a stab redesigning her.

Maybe make it legendary in that case? Last time I checked, Infernal Nasus was used to help update Nasus himself and SG Rumble helped some of the animations for Rumble. Maybe AL Eve could help set a bar too?

;_; Yeah I wish that, if you guys don't want to make new skins for her until the rework is done, that at least the rework was something on the agenda. Between nerfs and lack of skins, Eve could use some love.
Riot is too busy destroying Eve's gameplay and then her character to be concerned with new skins :(

Putting aside that I have no idea why Eve is considered not-OK but Shaco is totally-OK and my own likeness for Eve and hatred of Shaco for the exact same reason I hate playing *other* Evelynns...She needs a new skin so badly, it hurts. The girl doesn't even have anything close to a decent 975, the best we have are recolors and like one pretty minor re-model with no new effects. Nothing that makes her look anything close to modern.

It hurts. It HURTS.

*slumps* I like playing Evelynn, and other people do, too, so why is she so horribly ignored in the skin department?
Honestly, you should make more skin concepts because TBH Your artwork is on fleek.

> I like that the religious/cult vibe of the arclight skins contrasts so heavily with Eve's thematic design. I imagined a clash or organ/bells when she ults, like a church :)  {{champion:28}}

Her boobs are hanging out...
I like this religion.
This reminds me of the Dalish in Dragon Age with the markings, ears, etc. Anyways, beautiful~
Id buy it. And tap it ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°).

ooh boy that face is creepy. 

But I luv that cape +1
Just saying I need that skin in my life. I'm level 5 with Eve have Tango and Masquerade, but all I need is this skin.

I feel you, man. I got Tango, Masquerade, and Safecracker, and it's like, let us Eve mains have a little fun once in a while besides literally changing our colors, and having a minor model change with no new effects. She's an *ancient* champion, and she's never once received a half-decent 975-level skin that makes her look modern, by today's standards. It's just not cool.

Cool design dude! A light-themed skin like this one would be really neat on Evelynn, and I imagine this concept really makes her animations and abilities fit a light-theme. It's an especially great idea to mimic the shape of the original's strands with a short cloak, which gives it a new but recognizable silhouette.
I'm glad you noticed the cloak! I wasn't sure how to incorporate the stringy things so I tried for an alternative
They're still messing with her so I doubt any new skins will be coming for a while but that is amazing. Even the little stuff like her cloak just add to the awesome ness. I would totally buy it.
